backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister implementing chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, and access control with storage and validation logic.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing two frontend feature changes related to adjusting layout spacing and positioning in ChatArea.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, chat features, input handling, and styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting viewport configuration and loading the React application root script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router layout, lobby and chatroom routes, 404 handling, and theme/toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting preset avatars, uploading custom images, or removing the current avatar with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Core chat interface rendering messages, pinned video, reply workflow, auto‑scrolling, message navigation, and a compact stats/header section.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom preview card with media thumbnails for YouTube, Twitch, or Twitter, fetching thumbnails dynamically and handling fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog to create a chatroom with topic, description, category, and media (upload, video URL, or Twitter), including validation and upload handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar picker controls.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays an individual chat message with reactions, timestamps, media embedding, pinning, replies, and Twitter widget loading.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Provides the message composer with text, media upload, video/Twitter validation, and voice recording support.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause control, progress tracking, and synchronization with other audio elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and auth-client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for chatrooms, search, filtering, and utilities for user metadata and list conversion.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, layout, and mobile input adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides number formatting utility for compact representations like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Extracts IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generates corresponding thumbnails and embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments its view count once, handles loading and error states, and renders ChatArea when data is ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays the lobby of chatrooms with search, category filters, and creation dialog, choosing data from multiple queries based on active filters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, and versions for the Chattr app including frontend and backend capabilities.
